Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $12,000. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond soon to secure your purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
